items.title: Warren Buffett shocks shareholders by announcing his intention to retire at the end of the year
items.description: Earlier, Buffett warned Saturday about the dire global consequences of President Donald Trump's tariffs.

items.title: ‘Anything can happen’: Trump doesn't seem fazed by recession worries
items.description: Trump has blamed shaky economic numbers on his predecessor.

items.title: Democrats look to Trump's poor economic numbers with anxious optimism
items.description: Following its latest round of focus groups, Navigator Research is urging Democrats to proactively push their own economic policies.

items.title: Warning signs for Trump as pessimistic outlook on the economy grows among Americans
items.description: Trump’s winning issue is becoming one of his biggest liabilities as multiple polls this week reveal growing disapproval numbers on the economy.

items.title: Trump, defiant on tariffs, claims trade deals are in the works
items.description: The president is foreshadowing deals with multiple trading partners in an apparent effort to quell economic anxiety and prove his tariff plan is worki...
